lines: at 3m, we discover and innovate in nearly every industry to help solve problems around the world.
designed for interior corrosion protection of production tubing, line pipe, and fittings
when applied over a primer, 3m scotchkote xc-6171 meets saudi aramco seawater and sour gas service requirements

3m scotchkote fusion-bonded epoxy coating xc-6171, pipe grade, 65 lb.
sds, rds, more regulatory & compliance information
3m scotchkote fusion-bonded epoxy coating xc-6171 is a one-part, heat curable, thermosetting, powdered epoxy coating designed for coating the interior of production tubing, line pipe, and fittings.
